name: Cloudbot
description:
Cloudbot is a game developed by Alex Place for the first LibGDX Game Jam, that takes place between December 18th, 2015 and January 18th, 2016.

Taking place in a popular meme sharing server's hard drive you must prove that your worth the space or risk being deleted. Are you the dankest most viral meme yet?

This game is a casual shooter that will melt your brain with simplicity.
